Summary: I promised myself I wouldnt report this
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Dixon
There were no other sightings in Dixon on or around September 2nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was a breaking point. I was the guy who reported the st charles sightings and talked a little stupid. Anyways I love MUFON sight so ill share this was so cool. To be honest I was at a farm ranch in Dixon , home of Ronald regan for a DUI weekend getaway. So having seen shooting stars numerous times and funny lights moving slowly for a long time I decided to wander off after the rest of the bunch went to bed. So I took a walk on the farm ranch and it appeared the entire sky started following me and this white bright light i see nightly over our house in st charles blinked on and off multiple times as if it knew i was watching the skies for it. So being a fool like I am and acting like Moses I screamed out loud in a way and said "come pick me up Yeshua , come Shu come Eset, Im not afraid" deep in the middle of a deserted ranch by myself. So then I said Show me a sign at least , that guy in Arizona gets to see the full show on a regular basis. And this amazing thing happening. This Neon blue thing swooped down like the size of 3 football fields at like 10 times the speed of any plane ive ever seen. It was amazing so I spent until 4 am trying to get abducted and obviously it never happened. I dont pray or go to church. Love Jolly Roger
